mapper.select: select d.* from ( select c.*, rownum rn from ( select c.*, b.b_no as "cal_b_no" from bus b, calculate c where b.b_no = c.cal_b_no order by c.cal_b_no desc) c ) d where rn between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into calculate (cal_code, cal_date, cal_b_no, cal_hap_c, cal_hap_m, cal_total, cal_nametag, cal_bigo) values(NEXT_CAL_CODE, #{cal_date}, #{cal_b_no}, #{cal_hap_c}, #{cal_hap_m}, #{cal_total}, #{cal_nametag}, #{cal_bigo} )
mapper.select: select b.b_no as "c.cal_b_no", c.cal_code, c.cal_date, c.cal_hap_c, c.cal_hap_m, c.cal_total, c.cal_nametag, c.cal_bigo from bus b, calculate c where b.b_no = c.cal_b_no and cal_code = #{cal_code}
mapper.update: update calculate set cal_date = sysdate, cal_bigo = #{cal_bigo} where cal_code = #{cal_code}
